body_html:
Turns out there are other lib files under C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\libs that cannot be passed to linker, I've updated the change to only use pythonXY.lib as output of the genrule.
Testing at http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pr-win-bazel/29/console
body_text:
Turns out there are other lib files under C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\libs that cannot be passed to linker, I've updated the change to only use pythonXY.lib as output of the genrule.
Testing at http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pr-win-bazel/29/console
body:
Turns out there are other lib files under `C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\libs` that cannot be passed to linker, I've updated the change to only use `pythonXY.lib` as output of the genrule.
Testing at http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pr-win-bazel/29/console
